name: Castle Of Magic
description:
This magical platformer will keep you
jumping for hours between the two
screens of your Nintendo DSi! Stand
up to the wildest monsters in
environments that directly influence
your movement: Stick, slide, swim and
much more! Use your Nintendo DSi
camera not only to customize game
items but also to transform into new
powerful forms! Visit a Photo Cabin in
the game and take the picture of an
object in real life that matches the
colour of the character you want to
transform into. Itâ€™s magic!
